title: $2111 -- Buenos Aires and Patagonia: 10 Nights w/Air, Hotel, Taxes
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $2111 -- Buenos Aires and Patagonia: 10 Nights w/Air, Hotel, Taxes $2111 -- Buenos Aires and Patagonia: 10 Nights w/Air, Hotel, Taxes by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff - October 7, 2015 at 7:03 PM Tweet 
If you're looking to go down south of the border, why not head down waaaay south to what's commonly referred to as the End of the Earth. Ride into Patagonian wonderlands with nicknames like "The Capital of Glaciers," "The Land of Fire," and the "Gateway to Patagonia Wildlife;" but first, visit the most European city of the Americas, Buenos Aires. Ten-night vacation packages start at $2,111. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from Miami; other departure cities are available at varying rates Four nights' accommodations in Buenos Aires Four nights' accommodations in El Calafate Four nights' accommodations in Ushuaia Four nights' accommodations in Puerto Madryn Airline taxes and fuel surcharges Hotel taxes Daily breakfast 
How to get this deal: Visit TripMasters ' website. Travel at these rates is valid for departures from Miami on November 25, 2015. The offer provider hasn't listed a booking deadline. 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
